title: There Were Giants Upon the Earth: Gods, Demigods, and Human Ance
description:

The Adam, he wrote, was genetically engineered by adding Anunnaki genes to those of an existing hominid, some 300,000 years ago. Then, according to the Bible, intermarriage took place: ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œThere were giants upon the EarthÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ who took AdamÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s female offspring as wives, giving birth to ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œheroes of renown.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ With meticulous detail, Sitchin shows that these were the demigods of Sumerian and Babylonian lore, such as the famed Mesopotamian king Gilgamesh as well as the hero of the Deluge, the Babylonian Utnapishtim.
